pronunciation.pinyin: pǎo le hé shàng pǎo bù liǎo miào
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: pao3 le5 he2 shang4 pao3 bu4 liao3 miao4

meanings.value: the monk can run away, but the temple won't run with him
you can run this time, but you'll have to come back
I'll get you sooner or later
also written 跑得了和尚，跑不了廟|跑得了和尚，跑不了庙[pao3 de2 liao3 he2 shang4 , pao3 bu4 liao3 miao4]
